EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-Partners' PON -Email-LigtR email1-T002B3.Email Invite 4
EmailTemplate.subject: Private Optical Network the end to end solution – 4th Webinar Nokia & LightRiver series
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Private Optical Network: The solution Redefining private optical networks for the enterprise Discover how your enterprise can deploy its own secure private optical network today using Nokia products and LightRiver’s end-to-end services for a solution that can provide:
- High availability and reliability - Security and data protection built in - Scalability to meet your needs over time
Find out more by watching the last webinar <[[http://lightriver.nokia.pages.services/lightriver-nokia-campaign]]> in the Nokia and LightRiver series. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
